attributes.action: put prisoners down to the coalmines to pay for their penal servitude
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Why should we spend £50,000 per year per prisoner on the penal system?

Why should a national resource - the coal mines - lie unused?

The country would be better off by a long way if convicted criminals were sent to the coalmines to generate revenue for the country against which they have commited their crime. We the tax payers have had enough. We want to see hard time that makes crime pay - pay the taxpayer back.

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps with several already in existence -
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/MakeCrooksPay/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
